content: Property Asked by AnonymousAsked on 27 Jun 2019Supposed that there are 2 flats of same size and both 5 years, is there any value in buying a resale DBSS as compared to a resale BTO next to it? Siow Nan, Electrical And Computer Engineering at NusLevel 6. MasterAnswered on 29 Jun 2019The better value is the cheaper one then..0 comments0

Yinghua LiuLevel 4. ProdigyAnswered on 29 Jun 2019If same size and age, I would prefer buying resale bto over resale DBSS. Given all the negative news regarding DBSS, I would also pick EC over DBSS if I have sufficient funds. I only have to wait another 5years for the EC to be private but DBSS is just HDB with “premium” features.0 comments0
